title: Field One
description: Every conspiracy protected just one thing...Mankind extinct in 64 The data couldn’t lie.Archive’s conclusion was To escape, make Time.Their solution was 7 billion people must never know.Their solution is failing.The future lies with a child genius fascinated by time,an officially retired space program,an Arctic Circle anomaly,and Field One...Field One is the first book in the enthralling Field Series.If you're looking for hard Sci-fi with a fresh take on Time Travel, then you’ll love this gripping thriller!Take your first step into the Field now,The world you know is about to change...
author: Simon Winstanley
